name: invisibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to see, or that is not noticed: This crisis has been building invisibly for years. They swam almost invisibly in the shadows. See
invisible
More examplesFewer examplesThey had servants who almost invisibly cleaned up after them.Some cracks begin invisibly inside the wheels.She lived quietly and almost invisibly in the United States.
